Package gobblin.audit.values.policy.column

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ColumnProjectionPolicy
    An interface that projects certain columns/fields of an input GenericRecord to generate a new GenericRecord that can be audited.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractColumnProjectionPolicy
    A base ColumnProjectionPolicy that reads config to initialize the key and delta columns to project for a table.
    DefaultColumnProjectionPolicyFactory
    Default factory class to create new ColumnProjectionPolicys
    ProjectAllColumnProjectionPolicy
    An AbstractColumnProjectionPolicy that projects all columns/fields of the inputRecord
